new_skill_specs.name: extract_object_counts_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract counts of specific objects based on their descriptions from an image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with object descriptions as keys and their counts as values.
edge_cases: Descriptions not matching any objects in the image

tests.input: {"image_hash": "67d7968e2bae", "object_descriptions": ["big red metallic spheres", "big brown matte things"]}
tests.expect: {"big red metallic spheres": 5, "big brown matte things": 3}

new_skill_specs.name: subtract_object_counts
new_skill_specs.purpose: Subtract counts of specific objects from a total number of objects.
new_skill_specs.outputs: An integer representing the number of objects left after subtractions.
edge_cases: Total less than sum of subtractions

tests.input: {"total": 20, "subtractions": {"big red metallic spheres": 5, "big brown matte things": 3}}
